title: Generate documentation using Postman collections
description:
Enterprise only. Generates postman documentation automatically through `krakend postman export` command.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/developer/postman/

description.title: API Collection Description
description.description:
An introductory, optionally verbose, explanation supporting Markdown syntax. If you'd like to load an **external markdown file**, you can use flexible configuration, for instance `"description": {{include "postman/intro.md" | toJson }}`

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/developer/postman/

folder.title: Folder
folder.description: The folder definition where you will add endpoints

description.title: Folder description
description.description: A description explaining the items inside this folder
examples: Books from post-apocalyptic dystopias to brilliant time-travel

name.title: Folder name
name.description: The folder name. This might look like the path in an operative system with a slash /, but is not strictly necessary. Usage of special chars is allowed.
examples: /本/サイエンスフィクション

name.title: Collection Name
name.description:
The name of the Postman collection you are generating.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/developer/postman/

version.title: Collection Version
version.description:
The version you assign to this Postman collection you are generating using **semantic versioning**.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/developer/postman/
